⚠️ HIGH: Add approval workflows for high-risk operations

📋 MEDIUM: Add safety validation for all system-level operations

commands.name: /pipeline
commands.description: Unified intelligent pipeline orchestration with creation, execution, monitoring, deployment, and CI/CD integration

commands.name: /map-reduce
commands.description: Distribute work across parallel agents then aggregate results using map-reduce pattern
commands.tools: Task, TodoWrite, Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Glob

commands.name: /project
commands.description: Comprehensive project management suite with setup, provisioning, workflow orchestration, scheduling, tracking, and deployment operations

commands.name: /mass-transformation
commands.description: Ultimate transformation workflow that spawns 50+ agents for complete framework conversion

commands.name: /research
commands.description: Advanced research framework with intelligent information gathering, analysis synthesis, and knowledge discovery

commands.name: /dev-test
commands.description: Advanced development testing with comprehensive coverage, intelligent test generation, and automated quality validation

commands.name: /query
commands.description: Intelligent codebase query and analysis with contextual understanding and comprehensive insights

commands.name: /swarm
commands.description: Orchestrate a swarm of specialized agents working in parallel on complex tasks
commands.tools: Task, TodoWrite, Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Glob

commands.description: Execute tasks using Directed Acyclic Graph orchestration with adaptive agent spawning
commands.tools: Task, TodoWrite, Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Glob

commands.description: Enforces code quality standards using configurable quality gates

commands.description: Intelligent end-to-end (E2E) testing with automated test script generation, browser automation, and comprehensive reporting

commands.name: /think-deep
commands.description: Advanced deep thinking and problem-solving with structured analysis, multi-perspective exploration, and comprehensive synthesis

commands.name: /mega-platform-builder
commands.description: Ultimate platform builder that spawns 100+ agents for complete enterprise platform development

commands.description: Orchestrate agents in a tree-like hierarchy with parent-child relationships and delegation
commands.tools: Task, TodoWrite, Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Glob

commands.name: /dag-executor
commands.description: DAG execution engine with dependency resolution, parallel processing, and error recovery

commands.name: /auto
commands.description: Intelligent command router with Claude 4 optimization, adaptive thinking, and advanced parallel execution

commands.description: A helpful guide to the prompt factory, providing information on commands, usage, and best practices

commands.name: /task
commands.description: Execute a focused, integration-first TDD workflow with mutation testing, OWASP compliance, and advanced error handling
